title: Oh My Ice Goddess - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Protagonist   Gangs
author: Purpleyhan
description:
She’s cold.

Expressionless.

Scary.

An ice.

They said no one’s on par with her. They said she’s notorious and vicious. Nobody can withstand her coldness. But they don’t really know her well to say those things.

She’s actually strong. She cares for her comrades. She has a sense of justice. She’ll do anything to protect her loved ones.

She might be nobody for the others.

But she’s somebody to us.

For she, is our Ice Goddess.>
